typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		action as string,
		date as date,
		deviceId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	limit: 100,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 filter(action=='Close') ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['result.parquet'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
